item.title: Top 15 RTS Games That You Should Be Playing in 2024
item.description: Real-time strategy has been one of the cornerstones of gaming for years now. That's not to say there haven't been more modern takes on the genre more recently. Joel RPG explores some of the RTS games that you should be playing in 2024.

item.title: The Casting Of Frank Stone: All Rellik Locations
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Chapter 1: The Hillbilly
  • Chapter 2: The Huntress
  • Chapter 3: The Trapper
  • Chapter 5: The Wraith
  • Chapter 5: The Clown
  • Chapter 6: The Legion
  • Chapter 8: The Nurse
  • Chapter 9: The Doctor
  • Chapter 12: The Twins
  • Chapter 13: The Spirit
  • Chapter 14: The Trickster
  • Ending: The Champion

The Casting of Frank Stone is a game by Supermassive Games, known for other horror inspired narrative games like The Dark Pictures Anthology . It is also a spin-off of the wildly successful Dead by Daylight franchise. This is quite the double whammy for players of both these franchises.

A game’s enjoyment and length can be extended by giving players something to collec t, as it encourages exploration and looking around every corner. One such collectable type are Relliks , which are based on Dead by Daylight ’s horrifying killers.

Chapter 1: The Hillbilly

After a conversation between Sam and Tom, Sam will find himself in some underground tunnels. As you push the story forward, you will eventually find a space you can crawl through. Do not crawl here, instead, turn to the right and follow the wall to some pipes you can vault over. In this small space there will be the Rellik based on Dead by Daylight’s Hillbilly on the floor. This will be the first on many real treats for Dead by Daylight fans, as they will never know which of these iconic killers will pop up next.

Chapter 2: The Huntress

At the start of the chapter, immediately make your way up the stairs to the second floor of the house — do not go back down these stairs or you risk progressing the story forward. You will see a table with a candle on it once you get to the top of either staircase. Investigate this spot to find a torn piece of paper. This will be a piece of piano sheet music, meaning you will now need to go find a piano. Turn left and follow the path. You will go up some more stairs and find a pair of doors along the right wall.

You will find a piano in this room, that when played, will open a secret passageway. Head all the way down the stairs beyond this passage and open the door at the bottom. You will see another door, but do not go through it just yet. You will find The Rellik based on The Huntress on the floor of the room you have just entered — next to an old armchair.

Chapter 3: The Trapper

Players will have a choice to make, to either go to the Drugstore or the Curiosity Shop. Players must select to go to the Curiosity Shop where this Rellik will be. Once the player can move, head straight to the counter, and then turn right to go all the way to the back right corner of the shop. This is where the Trapper will be located.

Chapter 5: The Wraith

Progress through the chapter until you get to a cutscene where Robert will list out all the things in his backpack to show how prepared he is. Follow him in the tunnels until you see a yellow circular grate. Follow the wall on the left instead of following Robert, you will squeeze through an opening and find the next Rellik, The Wraith. If you missed your chance to get this Rellik, fret not, as The Cutting Room Floor can be used to revisit any and all locations with Relliks that you might have missed. This also lets you enjoy many of the branching story options to see how things may have turned out differently.

Chapter 5: The Clown

Scary clowns are a staple in the horror genre, so its no surprise to see one here. The second Rellik of this chapter will come shortly after you have to make a choice between “Restrained” and “Casual” after the characters are done filming the final scene at the mill. Robert will be saying how much his father would disapprove of his actions. During this scene, head towards the 2 doors opposite where you start, but then take a right turn before reaching them. Take a left turn to enter a room with a small space you can crawl under. Go to the end of this new room and turn left to find The Clown Rellik on the floor.

Chapter 6: The Legion

Progress through chapter 6 until you pick up a key that sets your objective to find a place to use it. You will find this key after going up numerous stairwells. Follow the shelves of books until you find a ladder next to a chair. This Rellik will be close to the chair. This key is an important story item found at the very top of these stairs, so as long as you don't go down any stairs, you won't miss your chance at picking up this Rellik.

Chapter 8: The Nurse

Just like Clowns, there is just something terrifying about a distorted and/or horrifying nurse inspired creature. After wrapping up the last chapter as Madison, you will start the following chapter as Linda. Progress the chapter until you enter a storage room filled with old film reels and the objective of finding Sam.

Walk away from the door you entered while looking at your left, and you will see a lamp on the far wall. Walk towards this lap while looking at your left. You will see The Nurse lying on the floor in the corner between two shelves after a box of shirts you can interact with.

Chapter 9: The Doctor

The game will jump back to the past to follow young Linda at the mills. Progress the chapter to where you enter the tunnels after shutting off the boiler. Head down all the stairs and eventually you will find a ladder. Do not go up this ladder, it will cause the game to jump back to the manor in 2024.

Instead, go through the door on the right of the ladder and crawl under the small archway while following the right wall. You will come to a room with a door on the opposite side you crawled from. Open this door and push aside the piece of metal ahead of you to find a room with a cage in it. The Doctor Rellik can be found in this cage.

Chapter 12: The Twins

Progress the chapter until the cutscene where the knife dancer music box plays and follow the path that opens up. There will be several flights of stairs with a red light that you will need to go down. You will find a hallway with a grammar phone on the side you come out of. Follow this hallway while looking at the right side, and you will find The Twins standing on a table.

Chapter 13: The Spirit

Progress the chapter until you find and pick up the camera. Continue to move deeper through the tunnels, and you will find plenty of archways with grates. One of these archways will not have a grate on them, vault through it. Follow the right wall, and you will find another that you can vault through. Keep following the right wall again, and you will find The Spirit Rellik on the floor.

Chapter 14: The Trickster

Keep venturing through the woods and interacting with all the various events that are lingering within it. You will eventually hear Augustine's monologue as you approach an orange glow from a nearby fire. Follow the right side, and you will find a pathway that deviates away from the orange glow with a white door in the middle of nowhere.

Go through this door and the Rellik will be on the ground. If you see a passage that you will need to squeeze through with a fire on the other end, turn around, and you will see a path that is not the way you came from — this is the path the door is on the other end of.

Ending: The Champion

You will acquire this Rellik at the end of the game without any interaction on the players' part.

item.title: Avowed Can’t Afford to Pull Punches With One Playstyle
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Avowed should improve its melee combat to match its ranged combat.
  • Avowed should provide players with plenty of unique melee weapons and abilities to make the playstyle more attractive.
  • Avowed could make enemies more aggressive to justify the use of melee weapons in combat.

Despite Obsidian Entertainment's Avowed allowing players to approach combat in a variety of ways, early previews of the game have noted a lackluster experience with its melee combat. Even those who have yet to playtest Avowed might notice a slight preference given to its ranged combat, as it tends to put on an explosive show of lights, colors, and action. With Avowed 's delay now putting its release in February 2025, and if it turns out that its melee combat is truly lacking, it still has some time left to improve its melee combat and put it on par with its ranged combat.

There are likely plenty of ways Avowed could go about improving the melee portion of its combat. However, two of them involve the game providing players with plenty of unique melee weapons and abilities and making enemies aggressive enough to merit a melee playstyle.

Avowed Needs to Make Sure Its Melee Combat Is on Par With Its Ranged Combat

Avowed Needs Plenty of Unique Melee Weapons and Abilities to Increase the Playstyle's Appeal

If Avowed wants to ensure a decent portion of its players utilize its melee combat options, it can start by including plenty of unique melee weapons and abilities that might make the playstyle more appealing. At the moment, Avowed 's combat looks much more flashy when enjoyed from range, with wands that can fling magic at foes and grimoires that allow players to conjure spells from their bare hands. Avowed 's melee, on the other hand, appears to be very basic, despite the somewhat satisfying feedback that comes from landing a blow.

Avowed does provide players with the option of enchanting their non-unique melee weapons to enhance their abilities, like granting a two-handed sword the ability to inflict fire damage. However, that might be enough to justify players using a sword over a pistol or a spell. Instead, Avowed 's melee combat needs to feature a variety of melee weapons with unique passive traits, as well as a diverse array of abilities that might even allow melee weapons to transcend close-quarters combat. For example, perhaps players might be given the option to throw a one-handed axe in Avowed and retrieve it from enemies. Unique abilities like this might help players feel they have more versatility when showing a preference for melee combat.

Avowed's Bosses Need to Be Aggressive Enough to Merit the Use of Melee Weapons

Another way Avowed could encourage players to take advantage of its melee combat options is to make enemies and bosses aggressive enough to merit the use of melee weapons. If enemies aren't very aggressive and therefore don't come into close quarters with players very often, they might be better off dealt with from a distance using a wand or a bow. Unfortunately, this could make things far too easy for players and devalue the rewards they earn from defeating Avowed 's most challenging enemies.

Early gameplay footage has shown some of Avowed 's bosses being fairly aggressive, but that doesn't necessarily speak for the overall gameplay experience. Furthermore, not every enemy in Avowed necessarily needs to function this way, but it should still be frequent enough that melee weapons are worth equipping.

Even then, however, there might need to be plenty of melee weapon types and abilities to make the playstyle attractive enough to players.

So far, Avowed 's melee combat looks engaging, but maybe only for a short while. As is the case with Skyrim 's melee combat, it looks like it might be headed in the direction of being far too repetitive to maintain players' interest for a long period of time. Fortunately, Avowed 's skill trees make it so that players can mix and match different playstyles to ensure they rarely get stuck in a rut. Nevertheless, those who prefer melee combat over ranged may need some changes to take place in Avowed before they draw their swords.

item.title: Roblox: Punch Simulator Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Punch Simulator is an exciting Roblox game, but sometimes it takes a lot of time to achieve good results. To ease their way to the top, players can use the Punch Simulator codes listed in this article. Rewards that can be obtained by redeeming codes and other useful information about the popular Roblox game can also be found below.

Updated September 6, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Despite our best efforts, we have not found any fresh codes for this update. We understand that freebies are tempting, so we will continue to monitor the game and share new codes as soon as they become available.

All Punch Simulator Codes

Working Punch Simulator Codes

  • 50KLIKES - Enter this code to claim Gems and Lucky Gems.
  • SPOOKY - Enter this code to claim Gems and Lucky Gems.
  • WELCOME - Enter this code to claim 50 Gems and Short Swords.
  • 100LIKES - Enter this code to claim 10 Gems and Short Swords.
  • 1KLIKES - Enter this code to claim 40 Gems and Clover.
  • 150K - Enter this code to claim 30 Gems and Lucky Gems.
  • 4KLIKES - Enter this code to claim 30 Gems and Clover.
  • 10KLIKES - Enter this code to claim 50 Gems and Lucky Gem.

Expired Punch Simulator Codes

  • 6KLIKES - Enter this code to claim 40 Gems and Clover.

How to Redeem Codes in Punch Simulator

Punch Simulator doesn't really differ from other similar Roblox games in terms of code redemption. In the game, it can be done in a few simple steps and players will not have any problems with it. However, if some find it hard, they will find detailed step-by-step instructions below:

  • First, it is necessary to launch the Punch Simulator .
  • After that, when the players are already in the game, they have to find and press the settings button located at the bottom right.
  • Next, a menu will appear, where in the middle, there will be a large blue Codes button that needs to be pressed.
  • Finally, enter or paste the above code into the appropriate field and click Claim.

Punch Simulator Tips and Tricks

Below, players will find tips and tricks for Punch Simulator :

  • Use the Auto Train to AFK and level up a character.
  • Use Auto Fight for the same reasons.
  • As soon as it is possible, unlock new gloves, as it will give a big boost to the leveling speed.
  • Buying pets will give a big advantage in punching power.
  • Use the above-mentioned codes to be able to progress faster.
  • Complete quests for additional rewards.

The Best Roblox Fighting Games Like Punch Simulator

Trying something new is always exciting and fun. That is why below players can find 5 games similar to Punch Simulator . Hurry up and immerse in a new gaming experience:

  • Untitled Boxing Game
  • Boxing Simulator
  • Punch Simulator
  • Rogue Demon
  • Blox Fruits

About the Punch Simulator Developers

Habit Games are the cool developers who created Punch Simulator , as well as many other interesting games. Below, players will find all the games by Habit Games:

  • Tank Battles Simulator!
  • Tank Simulator X
  • Farming Simulator
  • Treasure Simulator
  • Boxing Fighting Simulator
  • FAT Simulator!
  • Weapon Collector Simulator
  • Blob Collector Simulator
  • Punch Simulator

item.title: Roblox: Ninja Battlegrounds Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Ninja Battlegrounds is one of the representatives of the Battleground genre, which is also based on the Naruto anime. Therefore, in battles, you can use the abilities of various shinobi from the original franchise. But to become stronger, you will need Coins, which can be easily obtained using Ninja Battlegrounds codes.

Unlike codes in other Roblox titles, these can only reward players with Coins. However, this makes them more useful since Coins can be used to purchase quite a few different items.

Updated September 6, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Don't miss out on valuable in-game rewards. Bookmark this page and check back later to learn about new code releases and updates.

All Ninja Battlegrounds Codes

Working Ninja Battlegrounds Codes

  • nbearly - Redeem this code to get 1200 Coins
  • NB - Redeem this code to get 1000 Coins

Expired Ninja Battlegrounds Codes

  • lee
  • naruto
  • awake
  • bearly
  • rank
  • Copy

Ninja Battlegrounds is not an easy experience, as from the very beginning you will be thrown into the thick of battle with other players. Therefore, it is expected that you will lose and find yourself in the safe zone after a few minutes. In it, you can purchase various cosmetic items, improve your Mastery, and even change your abilities. But all this requires plenty of Coins. Therefore, you should use Ninja Battlegrounds codes.

As always, these codes can reward you with valuable rewards in just a few clicks. But as we said, it will mainly be Coins. Also, they are valid for a limited time, so you should hurry to use them.

How to Redeem Ninja Battlegrounds Codes

Fortunately, using Ninja Battlegrounds codes is no more difficult than in other Roblox titles. All you need to do is follow these simple steps to redeem them:

  • Launch Ninja Battlegrounds .
  • Get to a safe place or reach the safe zone.
  • Click on the gear icon at the top of the screen to open settings.
  • Then, enter one of the codes in the appropriate box.
  • Finally, click Claim to claim your reward.
  • If the code has expired, you will see a corresponding message.

How to Get More Ninja Battlegrounds Codes

The best way to avoid missing new Ninja Battlegrounds codes is to follow our guide. As with the Fruit Battlegrounds guide, we will be updating it. In addition, you should visit the official developer pages to learn about codes and updates first-hand.

  • LDS Fighting Roblox Group
  • Lightning Dragon Studios Discord Server
